mapper.sql: id, device_id, serial, region, submit_date, batch, longitude, latitude, medicine_qua, medicine_name, area_fz, work_content, worker, remarks, pic, custom_town, reported, username,town,altitude
mapper.select:
select * from device where project = '药剂防治管理'
and adcode like '${adcode}%'
and town = #{town}
and (id = #{searchText} or province like concat('%', #{searchText}, '%') or city like concat('%', #{searchText}, '%') or area like concat('%', #{searchText}, '%') or town like concat('%', #{searchText}, '%'))
select * from device where manager = #{manager} AND project = '药剂防治管理'
select device.* from device left join device_map on device.id = device_map.device_id where user_id = #{worker} AND project = '药剂防治管理'
select * from device_medicine_maintance where id = #{id}
select * from device_medicine_maintance where device_id = #{deviceId} order by batch desc;
mapper.insert: insert into device_medicine_maintance (id, device_id, serial, region, submit_date, batch, longitude, latitude, medicine_qua, medicine_name, area_fz, work_content, worker, remarks, pic, reported, username,altitude ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{serial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{submitDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{batch,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicineQua,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaFz,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{workContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{worker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reported,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{altitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

id,
device_id,
serial,
region,
submit_date,
batch,
longitude,
latitude,
medicine_qua,
medicine_name,
area_fz,
work_content,
worker,
remarks,
pic,
custom_town,
reported,
username,

mapper.update:
update device_medicine_maintance left join device on device_medicine_maintance.device_id = device.id
device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
serial = #{serial,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
region = #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
submit_date = #{submitDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
batch = #{batch,jdbcType=INTEGER},
device_medicine_maintance.longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device.longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_medicine_maintance.latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device.latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
medicine_qua = #{medicineQua,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
medicine_name = #{medicineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area_fz = #{areaFz,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
work_content = #{workContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
worker = #{worker,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pic = #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device.CustomTown = #{customTown,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reported = #{reported,jdbcType=TINYINT},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where device_medicine_maintance.id = #{id}

update device_medicine_maintance set device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, serial = #{serial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, region = #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, submit_date = #{submitDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, batch = #{batch,jdbcType=INTEGER}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, altitude = #{altitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medicine_qua = #{medicineQua,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medicine_name = #{medicineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_fz = #{areaFz,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, work_content = #{workContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, worker = #{worker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pic = #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, custom_town = #{customTown,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reported = #{reported,jdbcType=TINYINT}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
